title: Self-Directed MOOC Design for Strengthening Elementary Mathematics Job Competencies Based on VR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Elementary Education Field Experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized VR simulation environment provided in a math instruction competency enhancement program for elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply five or more elementary math concepts (e.g., fractions, geometric spatial sense) to real classroom scenarios via VR simulations.
Learners independently establish weekly learning plans and achieve an 80%+ assignment submission rate.
Learners engage in peer feedback systems to perform at least three peer-evaluation activities.
Learners demonstrate conceptual application skills by scoring 85+ on formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
